item.description:
From all of those first, second and third place finishes at trivia, we've earned a lot of gift certificates. Come out and have dinner, at least partly subsidized, eat some decent food and chat with fellow group members. If you're in the mood, stick around for Karaoke.

Meet at 7pm, dinner and then, hang out for as long as you like, Karaoke starts around 9.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for the Meetup Sign and a huge table setup
item.name: Dinner & Karaoke @ Fatty McGees
